content: MT-50 U C-Channel profile Medium-duty unslotted C-Channel profile for use with MT-FL/MT-TL components in indoor environments ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > Modular support profiles- - - ### FEATURES:Features Economical – high load/weight ratio and rapid assembly make MT strut channel a more efficient alternative to welded MEP support structures Airtight strut channels – ideal for building modular frames in data centers, especially hot/cold aisle containment Simpler to install – compatible with the innovative MT System Twist-Lock, enabling the use of a wide range of MT connectors and baseplates Simpler to design – you can use Hilti MT components for all MEP installations from the lightest trapeze to the heaviest-duty modular framing Extensive software support – PROFIS Modular Support Engineering, the MEP Support Selector, Revit® families, and plug-ins for Staad Pro® and Smart 3D® are all available to streamline design and ordering Applications Floor-mounted MEP support structures in data centers, such as hot/cold aisle containment Suitable for use in dry, indoor environments ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material composition: S280GD Surface finish: Indoor Coated - Pre-galvanized Material thickness: 2.75 mm Technical Data | Material composition | S280GD | Surface finish | Indoor Coated - Pre-galvanized | Material thickness | 2.75 mm | Environmental conditions | Indoor ### ITEMS- 3919856 - MT 50 U Bundle (25 pc / 150 M) - Package Size 1 pc
